title: BRIEF-Badger Daylighting Announces Increase And Extension To Credit Facility

BRIEF-Badger Daylighting Announces Increase And Extension To Credit Facility

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 01, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Badger Daylighting Announces Increase And Extension To Credit Facility Oct 1 (Reuters) - Badger Daylighting Ltd : * BADGER DAYLIGHTING LTD. ANNOUNCES INCREASE AND EXTENSION TO CREDIT FACILITY * BADGER DAYLIGHTING LTD - TERM OF CREDIT FACILITY HAS BEEN EXTENDED FROM FOUR YEARS TO FIVE YEARS, WITH A MATURITY DATE OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2024 * BADGER DAYLIGHTING LTD - UNIT INCREASED SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY WITH A GROUP OF FIVE LENDERS FROM $145.0 MILLION TO $300.0 MILLIOM * BADGER DAYLIGHTING LTD - CREDIT FACILITY MAINTAINS AN ACCORDION FEATURE WHICH COULD PROVIDE AN ADDITIONAL $150.0 MILLION OF CREDIT CAPACITY

BRIEF-Badger Daylighting Announces Increase And Extension To Credit Facility
